TopicTitle: Update version 1.4.3 Kerbal EVA Translation RCS not working

Articles.Content: I noticed with 1.4.3 update that during an EVA with a kerbal, the translation RCS controls do nothing.  The rotation controls work fine.  It's possible this was an issue in 1.4.2 but i didn't play that version very much due to the exploding landing gear issue.  Has anyone else experienced this?
